basic_information.scholarship_name: Oklahoma City Human Resource Society Scholarship in HR Management

description: Eligibility Requirements Declared Human Resource Management major Must be enrolled full-time Minimum GPA 3.0 Minimum Junior classification Preference given to member of UCO HR Society Personal statement (250 words) describing why HRM was chosen as a major along with discussion of career aspirations One HR faculty recommendation letter

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Classification is Junior   or SIS_Classification is Senior
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Classification is Junior   or SIS_Classification is Senior

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
